abstract: A new report from the Census on income inequality at the state, metro area and neighborhood levels.
snippet: A new report from the Census on income inequality at the state, metro area and neighborhood levels.
lead_paragraph: It's probably no wonder that the "Occupy" movement began with Wall Street: the New York metropolitan area has the highest inequality in the country, according to a new report from the Census Bureau.

headline.main: New York Metro Area Has Highest Inequality in Country
